Question.Subject: can somebody please look at this site and tell me if...?
Question.Content:
the images are copyright or if i can use them http://www.nymcam.co.uk/050601.htm
if you cant see anything that says that they arent what shall i say to prove that i can use them and they are copyright free? i have already tried emailing the owner of the site but he hasnt replied. he hasnt been on it since 2008
Question.ChosenAnswer:
It says right on the bottom of his homepage:
(Reproduction of any part of this website including photographs and text without permission is strictly prohibited)
If he wont answer, the only thing i suppose you could do is when you use a picture, make sure his link is on it like in the bottom corner. I don't know that he would sue you for something like that, but he might.

Answer.Content:
It says right on the bottom of his homepage:
(Reproduction of any part of this website including photographs and text without permission is strictly prohibited)
If he wont answer, the only thing i suppose you could do is when you use a picture, make sure his link is on it like in the bottom corner. I don't know that he would sue you for something like that, but he might.
